sentence.Network_en: For a change, it was a gloriously sunny day.
sentence.Network_cn: 那天一反常态，天空阳光明媚。

sentence.Network_en: Some of the designs are subtle, some gloriously OTT.
sentence.Network_cn: 有些设计含蓄精妙，有些夸张绚丽。

sentence.Network_en: But the mission was successful, gloriously successful.
sentence.Network_cn: 但是，任务顺利完成，大获成功。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词汇的奥秘 ... quietly 安静地 gloriously 光荣地 similarly 相似地.
以g开头的英语英文单词 ... glorify 赞美(上帝)；颂扬 gloriously 光荣地，辉煌地 gloss 光泽，注解.
如何24小时玩转伦敦_新沪江英语网... ... ferris 人名 gloriously 堂皇地;极好地 celebrity 名声,名人.

list.abs: 光芒的英文翻译，光芒用英... ... 光芒四射 to radiate brilliant light 万丈光芒 gloriously radiant 耀眼的光芒 dazzling light.
next time I looked down , the clouds were rolling away a grey torrent to let light reach the earth and make the entire world gloriously bright .再向下看，云层像灰色急流，在滚滚流开，好让光线投到大地上去，使整个世界大放光明。
if he a talent and learns somehow to use the whole of it , he has gloriously succeeded , and won a satisfaction and a triumph few men ever known .如果他有点才能又知道充分使用它，他就可以取得辉煌的成就而获得人所不知的满意和胜利。
next time I looked down , the clouds were rolling away a grey torrent to let light reach the earth and make the entire world gloriously bright .再向下看，云层像灰色急流，在滚滚流开，好让光线投到大地上去，使整个世界大放光明。

entry.def: Something that is glorious is very beautiful and impressive.

example.ex: She had missed the glorious blooms of the Mediterranean spring.
example.tran: 她错过了地中海春季鲜花怒放的绚丽美景。

entry.def: If you describe something as glorious, you are emphasizing that it is wonderful and it makes you feel very happy.

example.ex: The win revived glorious memories of his championship-winning days...
example.tran: 这次胜利勾起了他对往昔那些夺冠岁月的美好回忆。

example.ex: We opened the windows and let in the glorious evening air.
example.tran: 我们打开窗户，让傍晚那沁人心脾的空气流进室内。

entry.def: A glorious career, victory, or occasion involves great fame or success.

example.ex: Harrison had a glorious career spanning more than six decades...
example.tran: 哈里森辉煌的职业生涯长达60多年。

example.ex: Her future could be more glorious even than her past.
example.tran: 她的未来甚至可能会比过去还要辉煌。

entry.def: Glorious weather is hot and sunny.

example.ex: I got dressed and emerged into glorious sunshine...
example.tran: 我穿好衣服，走进灿烂的阳光中。

example.ex: The sun was out again, and it was a glorious day.
example.tran: 太阳又出来了，这是个艳阳天。

means.word_mean: 1. with glory or in a glorious manner;

sentences.sentence: "where others had failed he had gloriously succeeded"
"how gloriously happy she had been during those few fleeting moments of time"

auth_sentence.content: The chronology is gloriously haywire but it reads quite naturally.
auth_sentence.res_content: The chronology is gloriously haywire but it reads quite naturally.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The chronology is gloriously haywire but it reads quite naturally.

auth_sentence.content: Now he is gloriously vindicated Strange times in my living room.
auth_sentence.res_content: Now he is gloriously vindicated Strange times in my living room.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Now he is gloriously vindicated Strange times in my living room.

auth_sentence.content: Such an overload can be gloriously exhausting.
auth_sentence.res_content: Such an overload can be gloriously exhausting.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Such an overload can be gloriously exhausting.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,表示"……的",通常在在名词后.; 2. 表副词,放在形容词后,"……地"

stems_affixes.word_buile: come来+ly……的→翩翩而来→美丽动人的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 昂贵的,价值高的,豪华的
stems_affixes.word_buile: cost代价+ly……的→adj.昂贵的,价值高的,豪华的
drizz毛毛雨+ly……的→adj.毛毛雨的[a drizzly day]
friend朋友+ly……的→adj.友好的,友谊的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 很可能的,合适的,可靠的
stems_affixes.word_buile: like像+ly……的→adj.很可能的,合适的,可靠的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 活泼的,活跃的;栩栩如生的,真实的
stems_affixes.word_buile: live活+ly……的→adj.活泼的,活跃的;栩栩如生的,真实的
man男人+ly……的→adj.男子气概的,果断的
niggard小气鬼+ly……的→adj.吝啬的,勉强的
otherworld超世+ly……的→adj.超脱尘世的,超俗的
spindle细长的人[或物]+ly……的→spindly细长的,纤弱的
time时间+ly……的→adj.及时的,适时的
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊
continuous连续的+ly……的→adv.不断地,连续地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 幸福地,愉快地,恰当地,幸亏
stems_affixes.word_buile: happy快乐的,幸福的+ly……的→happily幸福地
active积极的+ly……地→adv.活跃地,积极地
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊
according相符的+ly……地→adv.因此,从而
final最后的+ly……地→adv.最后,终于

stems_affixes.value_cn: 实际上,事实上,竟然,居然,如今
stems_affixes.word_buile: actual[adj.实际的, 真实的, 现行的, 目前的]+ly……地→adv.实际上,事实上,竟然,居然,如今
adequate足够的+ly……地→adv.充分地
consequent作为结果的+ly……地→adv.从而,因此
anxious担忧的+ly……地→adv.忧虑地,不安地
biological[adj.生物学的]+ly……地→adv.生物学上
certain肯定的+ly……地→adv.的确,[口语]当然,行
chief主要的+ly……地→adv.首要,主要地
commercial商业的+ly……地→adv.商业上,通商上

stems_affixes.value_cn: 普遍地,通常地,现在,当前
stems_affixes.word_buile: current当前的,流动的+ly……地→adv.普遍地,通常地,现在,当前
decided确定的+ly……地→adv.果断地,断然地
definite明确的+ly……地→adv.一定地,明确地
easy容易的+ly……地→easily容易地
economical节约的,经济的+ly……地→adv.经济地,经济学地
exact强求,精确的+ly……地→adv.正确地,严密地
exceeding非常的+ly……地→adv.极端地,非常
excessive过分的+ly……地→adv.过分地,非常地
extreme极端的+ly……地→adv.极端地,极其,非常
aggressive侵略的+ly……地→adv. 侵略地,攻势地
financial财政的,金融的+ly……地→adv.财政上,金融上
formal正式的;形式的+ly……地→adv.正式地,形式上
fortunate幸运的+ly……地→adv.幸运地
general总的,大体的+ly……地→adv.一般,通常,一般地
glorious光荣的,显赫的+ly……地→adv.光荣地,辉煌地
great大的+ly……地→adv.大大地,非常
immediate立即的+ly……地→adv.立即,马上,直接地
incidental附带的+ly……地→adv.附带地,顺便提及
increasing渐增的+ly……地→adv.日益,愈加
instant立即的;紧迫的+ly……地→adv.立即地,即刻地
like像+ly……地→有些像的→很可能
logical逻辑的,符合逻辑的+ly……地→adv.论理上,逻辑上
mental精神的+ly……地→adv.精神上,智力上,在内心
moderate中等的,适度的+ly……地→adv.适度地
natural自然的+ly……地→adv.自然地
necessary必要的+ly……地→necessarily必要地
polite有礼貌的+ly……地→adv.客气地,斯文地,优雅地
positive肯定的,积极的+ly……地→adv.断然地;肯定地
preferable更可取的+ly……地→preferably更适宜
present现在+ly……地→adv.目前,不久
probable可能的+ly……地→probably或许,大概
progressive前进的+ly……地→adv.日益增多地
prompt敏捷的+ly……地→adv.敏捷地,迅速地
relative相对的;相关的+ly……地→adv.相关地
repeated重复的+ly表副词→adv.重复地,再三地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 立刻,不久,简略地,简言之,即刻
stems_affixes.word_buile: short短+ly……地→adv.立刻,不久,简略地,简言之,即刻
sufficient足够的+ly……地→adv.十分地,充分地
undoubted无疑的,确实的+ly……地→adv.无庸置疑地,的确地
unfortunate不幸的+ly……地→adv.不幸地
uniform贯的,一致的+ly……地→adv.一律地,均一地
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊
